sentences.en: ‘But why can’t I go?’ he said in a querulous voice.
sentences.cn: “可是为什么我不能去呢？”他抱怨道。

sentences.en: He was also petty, unreasonably querulous, and mean.
sentences.cn: 他还是个气量狭窄, 无事生非, 平庸刻薄的人.

sentences.en: He was not one who was inclined to be querulous.
sentences.cn: 他并不是爱吹毛求疵的人.

sentences.en: One gets unsettled, depressed, and inclined to be querulous.
sentences.cn: 有的人变得心绪不宁, 神情沮丧, 动不动就爱发牢骚.

sentences.en: The querulous old man refused to be put on the shelf.
sentences.cn: 那个爱抱怨的老人不肯让人撇在一边.

words.tran_cn: 易怒的，暴躁的；爱发牢骚的，抱怨的；爱挑剔的

trans.tran_cn: 抱怨的，爱发牢骚的，易怒的，爱抱怨
trans.tran_en: someone who is querulous complains about things in an annoying way
